channel.title: Networth command

item.title: Networth command
item.dc:creator: @Ryan4965 Ryan4965
item.description:
@Ryan4965 wrote:

I’m trying to make a networth command on my 317 server.

I have this:

public long totalvalue() { try { for(int i = 0; i < bankItems.length; i++){ totvalue += GetItemValue(bankItems[i]-1); } for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++){ totvalue += GetItemValue(playerItems[i]); } return (long)(totvalue); } catch ( Exception e ) {} return 0; }

But when I type ::networth, the number changes each time.

Here’s my networth command:

if(command.startsWith("networth")) { sM("Your networth is @or2@"+totalvalue()+ "@bla@ coins."); }

Read full topic
